swp.tuilmenau.carduinodroid.controller

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp.tuilmenau.carduinodroid.controller.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends Object
    Provides an API for handling and changing connection data.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paul Thorwirth
    See Also:
    ConnectionManager

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Connection(Activity activity, LOG nlog)
      Retrieves an Instance of the ConnectivityManager and registers a BroadcastReciever to react on Connectivity-Events
